'''Anemo Treasure Compass''' is a [[Treasure Compass|treasure compass]] [[gadget]] that can be used to search for nearby [[chests]] in [[Mondstadt]]. It can be created through [[forging]] after using the [[Diagram: Anemo Treasure Compass|diagram]] obtained by reaching [[Reputation]] Level 6 in Mondstadt.

{{Transclude|Treasure Compass|compass intro|section=1}}

|Philanemo Mushroom = 30

}}

==Gameplay Notes==
{{Transclude|Treasure Compass|Gameplay Notes}}

==Descriptions==
{{Description|A handy tool used to locate nearby chests. The needle of the Treasure Compass doesn't spin according to the world's magnetic field, but follows the energy of ley lines to lead the user to treasure. It is rumored that some adventurers are vehemently against the use of such tools, because of strongly held ideals such as "treasure hunting is about the journey, not the destination," and so on...|[[Archive]]}}
